name: Consultant
description: Consultant in the cyber security field, providing services support to clients

name: Practitioner
description: Practicing the cyber security profession as part of a supporting function within an organisation

name: Academic
description: Advancing the cyber security domain through academic research and/or lecturing at universities/technical institutes

name: Researcher
description: Researching on domain-specific issues or using cyber security as a tool to solve practical problems

name: Student
description: Undergraduate or postgraduate student reading for an IT or cyber security degree

name: Retired
description: Formally retired but still directly/indirectly involved in the cyber security field
